body:
Comment 1: 
There's not a lot of experience with any development yet,
but Effective Go (http://golang.org/doc/effective_go.html)
does develop a small web server at the end.  For more discussion
about web development I suggest using the mailing list
(see the link on the left side of any page on http://golang.org/).
_Owner changed to **r...@golang.org**._ _Status changed to **Done**._
